mapper.update: update t_project set deleted_flag = #{deletedFlag} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.*, c.customer_name as customerName, p1.name as thirdPartyName, CASE WHEN t.source_type = 1 THEN p2.name WHEN t.source_type = 2 THEN e.actual_name ELSE NULL END AS sourceName FROM t_project t left join t_customer c on t.customer_id = c.customer_id left join t_third_party p1 on t.source_id = p1.id LEFT JOIN t_third_party p2 ON t.source_type = 1 AND t.source_id = p2.id LEFT JOIN t_employee e ON t.source_type = 2 AND t.source_id = e.employee_id where t.id = #{id}

SELECT count(1) FROM t_project t
t.deleted_flag = 0
AND t.expected_date <= DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 10 DAY) AND t.status != 2
AND t.id in ( select distinct l.project_id from t_project_lab l where l.lab_expected_date <= DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 DAY) AND l.status != 2 )
AND DATE_ADD(t.audit_date, INTERVAL 1 YEAR) <= DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) AND DATE_ADD(t.audit_date, INTERVAL 1 YEAR) > CURDATE()
AND t.id in ( SELECT distinct n.project_id FROM t_project p left join t_project_node n on p.id = n.project_id WHERE DATE_ADD(p.audit_date, INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= CURDATE() and n.node_id = 14 and n.status = 0 )
